Sentence.sentence: We need very broad participation to fully address the global tragedy that results when countries fail to take into account the negative impact of their carbon emissions on the rest of the world.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The practice of clocking in for an  eight-hour workday is a leftover from the days of the Industrial Revolution, as reflected in the then-popular  saying, Eight hours labor, eight hours recreation, eight hours rest.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In other words, our inner caveman is continually looking over his shoulder to see what the rest of the tribe are up to.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Some of the heat is used directly or produces useful work; the rest is lost or rejected, radiated into the atmosphere from the engines, motors, boilers and all the energy-consuming machinery that makes American’s wheel go around.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Famous people are entitled to a few failings, like the rest of us.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Applicants are usually better off if they can write an essay that distinguishes them from the rest.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And though Hu Jintao and the rest of the Chinese leadership aren't inclined to lecture visiting Presidents, he might gently hint that Beijing is getting a little nervous about the value of the dollar-which has fallen 15% since March, in large part because of increasing fears that America's debt load is becoming unmanageable.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I turn to eccentric measures to try to keep my mind sober and ensure that I have time to do nothing at all (which is the only time when I can see what I should be doing the rest of the time)
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The evidence shows that a large number of universities have fallen off the back of the pack, a few perform strongly and the rest chase the leaders.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There is considerable and justified concern that the United States is falling behind much of the rest of the developed world in these essential disciplines.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They also need to think about resting their voices after a show.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: A study published last year in The American Journal of Clinical Nutrition found that people who sleep more tend to eat less unhealthy food than their peers who don't get as much rest.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）听力  Section B

Sentence.sentence: After that, a few small populations left Africa to populate the rest of the world.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: And now, for the lighter side of the news, Europe is setting an example for the rest of the world, when it comes to food waste.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Anything like numbers, names, places have to be noted down, but the rest is never translated word for word.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: For the rest of us, however, our hearty lower-tiered universities are just fine, thank you.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: However, if a 1916 piece by her great-niece is to be trusted, Hale claimed for the  rest of her life that "some other people pretended that someone else wrote the poem".
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Most consist of timber frames that rest on stone blocks.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: That's because rest and recovery are not the same thing.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The practice of clocking in for an eight-hour workday is a leftover from the days of the Industrial Revolution, as reflected in the then-popular saying, "Eight hours labor, eight hours recreation, eight hours rest."
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The rest is feed-lot confined and fed grain and corn.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

means: Radar Electronic Scan Technique 雷达电子扫描技术

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"中止，停止，休息"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: break, rest, pause, interval, recess, cease, stop
means: break ： 非正式用词，指突然的或短时间的中止，如工作或活动期间接短暂休息。
rest ： 指统称的休息。
pause ： 指短暂的中断或停止，含再进行下去的意味。
interval ： 指一出戏在幕与幕之间，音乐会上下串场之间或演出中预先安排的休息；也可泛指事件之间的一段时间。
recess ： 正式用词，指业务活动或工作中短暂的或长时间的休息。
cease ： 正式用词，侧重逐渐结呸某活动或状态，含永远结束的意味。
stop ： 普通用词，指迅速或突然中止某行为、活动或状态。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"舒适，安逸，悠闲"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: comfort, ease, leisure, relaxation, relief, rest
means: comfort ： 通常指在摆脱烦人、痛苦的事情，或在要求、愿望得到满足后所感到的舒适。
ease ： 指因没有担心和忧虑而轻松。
leisure ： 专指闲暇时间或悠闲状态。
relaxation ： 强调消除肌肉疲劳或思想的紧张状态，使身心松弛，得到休息。
relief ： 侧重有消除痛苦、不适或困难的负担，常暗含不利因素已不存在的意味。
rest与work相对，强调水分除身心痛劳，不着重休息方式。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"剩余部分"之意。
means: remainder ： 含义较广，可指数学运算中的余数，也指从整体取走或用掉部分后的所余部分，或一群人走掉一部分剩下的人。
surplus ： 指超过需要数量之外的剩余。
rest ： 最普通用词与定冠词连用，指任何指定数量的人或物等。
remains ： 常指人或动物死后的遗体或遗骨，也指古代文明的遗迹或去世作家尚未发表的遗稿。
balance ： 指支取存款的余额或减去各种开支后的尾数。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+pugn打+ant……的→[把人]打回去→[行为]令人厌恶的
re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的
re回,向后,相反,不+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
re回,向后,相反,不+peal驱动→反驱动→取消;参考:appeal呼吁
re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行
re一再,重新+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息
re一再,重新+surg升起,浪潮+ence表名词→重起浪潮→复兴
re回,向后,相反,不+proach接近→不接近→指责
re反+volt转→反过转→反叛
re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回
re回+treat→v.后退,撤退
re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排
re一再,重新+assure确保→v.消除某人疑虑
re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点
re一再,重新+claim喊→喊回来→取回,引申为开垦荒地
re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬
re一再,重新+furbish装饰→再装饰→刷新
re一再,重新+in入+carn肉+ate表动词→重新进入肉体→产生
re一再,重新+in入+state国家,权力→重新进入权力
re一再,重新+iterate重说→反复重说

stems_affixes.value_cn: 描述,表示,象征;代表;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: re一再+present出席的;上演→一再上演,出席的→象征;代表
re一再,重新+produce生产,制造→v. 生殖;再现;繁殖;复制
re一再,重新+verber震动+ate表动词→重新震动→起回声

Sentence.sentence: Take it easy for the rest of the day, and stay in the shade.

lj.lj_ly: The judge's ruling put to rest the dispute between the neighbors.
lj.lj_ls: 法官的裁决解决了邻里纠纷

entry.def: The rest is used to refer to all the parts of something or all the things in a group that remain or that you have not already mentioned.

example.ex: It was an experience I will treasure for the rest of my life...
example.tran: 我的余生都会珍惜这次经历。

example.ex: I'm going to throw a party, then invest the rest of the money...
example.tran: 我会开一个派对，然后把剩下的钱用来投资。

entry.def: You can add and the rest or all the rest of it to the end of a statement or list when you want to refer in a vague way to other things that are associated with the ones you have already mentioned.
entry.tran: 诸如此类;如此等等;不一而足

example.ex: ...a man with nice clothes, a Range Rover and the rest...
example.tran: 一个穿着体面、开着路虎如此等等的男人

example.ex: And what about racism and all the rest of it?
example.tran: 那种族主义之类的观念又怎么样呢？

entry.def: If you rest or if you rest your body, you do not do anything active for a time.

example.ex: He's tired and exhausted, and has been advised to rest for two weeks...
example.tran: 他精疲力竭，被建议休息两周。

example.ex: Try to rest the injured limb as much as possible.
example.tran: 尽量不要活动受伤的手臂。

entry.def: If you get some rest or have a rest, you do not do anything active for a time.

example.ex: 'You're worn out, Laura,' he said. 'Go home and get some rest.'...
example.tran: “你太累了，劳拉，”他说，“回家休息一下吧。”

example.ex: After I've had a good rest, I'll tell you everything.
example.tran: 我先好好歇一会儿，之后再告诉你一切。

entry.def: If something such as a theory or someone's success rests on a particular thing, it depends on that thing.

example.ex: Such a view rests on a number of incorrect assumptions...
example.tran: 这样的观点建立在很多不正确的假设之上。

example.ex: The long-term future of the country rests on how we teach our children.
example.tran: 国家的长远未来取决于我们如何教育孩子。

entry.def: If authority, a responsibility, or a decision rests with you, you have that authority or responsibility, or you are the one who will make that decision.

example.ex: The judge said that whether Miss Bergman wishes to admit it or not, the responsibility rests with her. ...
example.tran: 法官说不管伯格曼小姐愿不愿意承认，这件事的责任都在她。

example.ex: The final decision rested with the President.
example.tran: 最后的决定权在于总统。

entry.def: If you rest something somewhere, you put it there so that its weight is supported.

example.ex: He rested his arms on the back of the chair...
example.tran: 他把手臂放在椅背上。

example.ex: He rested one of his crutches against the rail.
example.tran: 他把一根拐杖靠在栏杆上。

entry.def: If something is resting somewhere, or if you are resting it there, it is in a position where its weight is supported.

example.ex: His head was resting on her shoulder...
example.tran: 他的头靠在她的肩上。

example.ex: He had been resting his head in his hands, deep in thought.
example.tran: 他双手撑着头，陷入了沉思。

entry.def: If you rest on or against someone or something, you lean on them so that they support the weight of your body.

example.ex: He rested on his pickaxe for a while.
example.tran: 他在尖嘴镐上靠了一会儿。

entry.def: A rest is an object that is used to support something, especially your head, arms, or feet.
entry.tran: （尤指头或四肢的）支撑物;撑架;托架

example.ex: When you are sitting, keep your elbow on the arm rest.
example.tran: 坐立时，把胳膊肘靠在扶手上。

entry.def: If your eyes rest on a particular person or object, you look directly at them, rather than somewhere else.

example.ex: As she spoke, her eyes rested on her husband's face.
example.tran: 她说话的时候，眼睛凝视着丈夫的脸。

entry.def: When an object that has been moving comes to rest, it finally stops.

example.ex: The plane had plowed a path through a patch of forest before coming to rest in a field.
example.tran: 飞机猛冲过一片森林，在一片田野中停了下来。

entry.def: If you say that someone can rest easy, you mean that they don't need to worry about a particular situation.

example.ex: How can any woman rest easy now, knowing her breast cancer may be misdiagnosed?
example.tran: 知道自己的乳腺癌可能被误诊，哪个女人能不担心呢？

entry.def: If someone tells you to give something a rest, they want you to stop doing it because it annoys them or because they think it is harming you.

example.ex: Give it a rest, will you? We're trying to get some sleep...
example.tran: 你安静一下，好吗？我们想睡一会儿。

example.ex: I think you ought to give football a rest for a time.
example.tran: 我认为你应该暂时停止踢足球。

entry.def: If you say that someone who has died is laid to rest, you mean that they are buried.

example.ex: His dying wish was to be laid to rest at the church near his Somerset home.
example.tran: 他的遗愿是把他安葬在家乡萨默塞特郡附近的教堂里。

entry.def: If you lay something such as fears or rumours to rest or if you put them to rest, you succeed in proving that they are not true.

example.ex: His speech should lay those fears to rest...
example.tran: 他的演说应当会消除那些忧虑。

example.ex: I am determined to put to rest these rumours that we are in financial trouble.
example.tran: 我决定平息那些说我们正面临财政困难的谣言。

entry.def: If someone refuses to let a subject rest, they refuse to stop talking about it, especially after they have been talking about it for a long time.
entry.tran: (尤指长时间的谈论后）停止讨论(某个话题)

example.ex: I am not prepared to let this matter rest...
example.tran: 我不准备就此罢休。

example.ex: Let it rest, Rachel. Leave her in peace.
example.tran: 别说了，雷切尔。让她平静一下。

entry.def: To put someone's mind at rest or set their mind at rest means to tell them something that stops them worrying.

example.ex: She was quick to put his mind at rest. 'Mrs Barrett will be delighted to have your brothers back,' she said...
example.tran: 她很快就让他放心了。“巴雷特太太会很高兴让你的兄弟们回来的，”她说道。

example.ex: A brain scan last Friday finally set his mind at rest.
example.tran: 上周五的脑部扫描终于让他放心了。

means.word_mean: 1. something left after other parts have been taken away;

sentences.sentence: "there was no remainder"
"he threw away the rest"
"he took what he wanted and I got the balance"

means.word_mean: 2. freedom from activity (work or strain or responsibility);

sentences.sentence: "took his repose by the swimming pool"
"people actually accomplish more when they take time for short rests"
"a body will continue in a state of rest until acted upon"

means.word_mean: 5. euphemisms for death (based on an analogy between lying in a bed and in a tomb);

sentences.sentence: "she was laid to rest beside her husband"
"they had to put their family pet to sleep"

means.word_mean: 6. a support on which things can be put;

sentences.sentence: "the gun was steadied on a special rest"

means.word_mean: 7. a musical notation indicating a silence of a specified duration
1. not move; be in a resting position
2. take a short break from one's activities in order to relax

sentences.sentence: "He rested his bad leg"
"Rest the dogs for a moment"

means.word_mean: 4. have a place in relation to something else;

sentences.sentence: "The fate of Bosnia lies in the hands of the West"
"The responsibility rests with the Allies"

means.word_mean: 6. stay the same; remain in a certain state;

sentences.sentence: "The dress remained wet after repeated attempts to dry it"
"rest assured"
"stay alone"
"He remained unmoved by her tears"
"The bad weather continued for another week"

means.word_mean: 8. put something in a resting position, as for support or steadying;

sentences.sentence: "Rest your head on my shoulder"
"The birds perched high in the treee"

means.word_mean: 10. rest on or as if on a pillow;

sentences.sentence: "pillow your head"
"The committee is resting over the summer"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ræst, rest (noun), ræstan, restan (verb), of Germanic origin, from a root meaning 'league' or 'mile' (referring to a distance after which one rests)
late Middle English: from Old French reste (noun), rester (verb), from Latin restare 'remain', from re- 'back' + stare 'to stand'

means: 休息
支撑
中止
安息
休息
剩余部分
停留
其他
支架
休止符
Radar Electronic Scan Technique 雷达电子扫描技术

sentences.en: She was quick to put his mind at rest. 'Mrs Barrett will be delighted to have your brothers back,' she said...

sentences.cn: 上周五的脑部扫描终于让他放心了。
sentences.en: A brain scan last Friday finally set his mind at rest.

sentences.cn: 我们停下来休息，也该休息一下了。
sentences.en: We stopped for a well-earned rest.

sentences.cn: 放下繁重的工作，休息一下
sentences.en: to have/take a rest from all your hard work

sentences.cn: 休息一下吧——你明天还要忙一天呢。
sentences.en: Try to get some rest ─you have a busy day tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 明天是休息日，没有比赛，但星期一继续比赛。
sentences.en: There are no matches tomorrow, which is a rest day , but the tournament resumes on Monday.

sentences.cn: 医生叫我休息。
sentences.en: The doctor told me to rest.

sentences.cn: 每过半小时让眼睛休息一下。
sentences.en: Rest your eyes every half an hour.

sentences.cn: 他精疲力竭，被建议休息两周。
sentences.en: He's tired and exhausted, and has been advised to rest for two weeks...

sentences.cn: “你太累了，劳拉，”他说，“回家休息一下吧。”
sentences.en: 'You're worn out, Laura,' he said. 'Go home and get some rest.'...

sentences.cn: 我想在树下休息一会儿.
sentences.en: I want to have a rest under the tree.

sentences.cn: 医生劝告我要完全休息.
sentences.en: The doctor advised ( suggested ) mea complete rest.

sentences.cn: 她满怀怜悯地看着他工作,注意到他越来越需要常常休息.
sentences.en: With compassionate eyes, she watched him working and saw the rest times grow more numerous.

sentences.cn: 让我休息吧, 我实在是精疲力竭了.
sentences.en: Let me take a rest, I'm all beat up.

sentences.cn: “失业不是休息” ( 威廉·考普尔 ).
sentences.en: Absence of occupation is not rest ( William Cowper ).

sentences.cn: 可能它在一次大爆发后正在休息.
sentences.en: Perhaps it's just resting after a major outburst.

sentences.cn: 我在书桌上写作业, 在沙发上休息.
sentences.en: I do my homework at desk, rest on sofa.

sentences.cn: 他们因为长时间使用眼睛不休息而伤害了他们(眼睛).
sentences.en: They hurt their eyes because they use them for a long time without resting.

sentences.cn: 他劝告她长期休息.
sentences.en: He adviced her to take a long rest.

sentences.cn: 我可以休息一下 么 ?
sentences.en: May I take a rest?

sentences.cn: 药物治疗和休息会使你的伤口很快愈合.
sentences.en: The medicine and rest will soon heal your wound.

sentences.cn: 琳达: 相信你们一定休息得很好.
sentences.en: Linda: I trust you've had a good rest.

sentences.cn: 有些在读报,有些就坐在长凳上休息.
sentences.en: Some are reading newspapers and some are just resting on the benches.

sentences.cn: 士兵们停止前进,休息一下.
sentences.en: The soldiers halted and rested from their march.

sentences.cn: 医生嘱咐要完全休息.
sentences.en: The doctor advised a complete rest.

sentences.cn: 我们不妨利用等的时间休息一下.
sentences.en: Now while we wait we can enjoy some rest.

sentences.cn: 明斯克:我们必须快点休息, 布布开始变得不安了.
sentences.en: We must rest soon . Boo is getting squirrely.

sentences.cn: 这个楼梯将休息室与桑拿区分开来.
sentences.en: The stairs separates the rest room from the sauna area.

sentences.cn: 你应该好好休息, 尽量避免紧张和压力, 同时戒烟,戒酒.
sentences.en: You should have a good rest, avoid tension or stress, and give up smoking and alcohol.

sentences.cn: 锻炼 、 节制 、 新鲜空气和必要的休息是最好的医生.
sentences.en: Exercise, temperance , fresh a _ r. and needful rest are the best all physicians.

sentences.cn: 我就不打搅您休息了.
sentences.en: Perhaps I should let you rest now.

sentences.cn: 绳索的剩余部分挽成圈套在肩膀上携带.
sentences.en: The rest of the rope is then carried the shoulders in a coil.

sentences.cn: 或者,单击“跳过”按钮跳过鼠标教程的剩余部分.
sentences.en: Or click the Skip button to skip the rest of this tutorial.

sentences.cn: 她绞尽脑汁记住这个故事的剩余部分.
sentences.en: She racked her brains to remember the rest of the story.

sentences.cn: 东非板块将从非洲的剩余部分分离出去.
sentences.en: Part of East Africa will break away from the rest of Africa.

sentences.cn: 本文剩余部分会使用HTTP来 讲述消息传输.
sentences.en: The rest of this HTTP will be used for message transport.

sentences.cn: 这里应该翻译为四个比剩余部分更有用的观点突出来了.
sentences.en: Four points stand out as being more important than the rest.

sentences.cn: 那老人微薄积蓄中的剩余部分都捐赠给了那个男孩。
sentences.en: The rest of the old man's exiguous savings are donated to that boy.

sentences.cn: 这条街比城市的其他地方要宁静多了.
sentences.en: This street is so much more peaceful than the rest of the city.

sentences.cn: 老师父宁静地长眠了.
sentences.en: The old master went to his rest peacefully.

sentences.cn: 洁净你的内心,在那完全宁静中找寻上主.
sentences.en: Purify your heart. Seek the Lord there and rest in solemn Silence.

sentences.cn: 我们总有一天要死的, 我的心很宁静.
sentences.en: We all die one day. My mind is at rest.

sentences.cn: 你的爱是悲哀中的慰藉, 喧嚣中的宁静, 疲惫中的憩息, 绝望中的希翼.
sentences.en: Your love is comfort in in sadness, quietness in tumult, rest in weariness, hope in despair.

sentences.cn: 我需要休息. 一个宁静的充分休息.
sentences.en: I need a rest. A restfully restful rest.

sentences.cn: 他的目光落在下面宁静的山谷中.
sentences.en: His eyes rested on the peaceful valley below.

sentences.cn: 心灵需求休息, 需要找到一片宁静的港湾.
sentences.en: The mind demand rest, needs to find a tranquil harbor.

sentences.cn: 沙漠在宁静中歇息,像熟睡的巨兽.
sentences.en: The desert rested quietly like a slumbering animal.

sentences.cn: 我想我一生从未像此刻这样宁静.
sentences.en: I think I have never been more at rest in my life than at this moment.

sentences.cn: 他的眼睛凝视着下面宁静的山谷.
sentences.en: His eyes rested upon the peaceful valley below.

sentences.cn: 那的确是一个宁静的天堂,是个休息的好地方.
sentences.en: It was definitely a heavenly place of rest and tranquility.

sentences.cn: 平静的良心能在雷声中入睡, 而安宁和负罪则无法毗邻.
sentences.en: A quite conscience sleeps in thunder, but rest and guilt live far adunder.

sentences.cn: 诉讼使人丧失时间 、 金钱 、 安宁和朋友.
sentences.en: Lawsuit consumes time, and money, and rest, and friends.

sentences.cn: 她想开自己的车, 在走动和紧张中得到安宁.
sentences.en: She wanted to drive her car, in motion and tension to find rest.

sentences.cn: 平静的良心能在蕾声中入睡, 而安宁和负罪则无法毗邻.
sentences.en: A quite conscience sleeps in thunder, but rest and guilt live for asunder.

sentences.cn: 在他的余生里,经过他的治理贝拿勒斯的人民生活幸福而安宁.
sentences.en: Throughout the rest of his reign, the people of Benares lived peacefully and happily.

sentences.cn: 那天晚上,在库克大院斯纳斯比先生家里, 整夜都得不到安宁.
sentences.en: It is anything but a night of rest at Mr. Snagsby's , in Cook's Court.

sentences.cn: 祭司和官长们心里却没有安宁.
sentences.en: Yet the priests and rulers were not at rest.

sentences.cn: 伯莎那受搅扰的灵魂并没有得到安宁.
sentences.en: Rest did not come to Bertha's troubled soul.

sentences.cn: 她正在回国途中,打算在自己的亲属中找到安宁,忘却过去.
sentences.en: She was herself returning home to seek rest and oblivion among her kins fold.

sentences.cn: 破产的耻辱可能会让他余生不得安宁。
sentences.en: The stigma of being a bankrupt is likely to haunt him for the rest of his life.

sentences.cn: 他手上沾了我儿子的血。我咒他余生不得安宁。
sentences.en: He has my son's blood on his hands. I hope it haunts him for the rest of his days.

sentences.cn: 要克服胆怯,就要倚靠真理的能力.
sentences.en: And overcoming timidity rests on the power of the truth of the message.

sentences.cn: 这个质子最终会静止 吗 ?
sentences.en: Does the proton finally come to rest?

sentences.cn: 木屑就聚集在位移波节处, 此处的气体是静止的.
sentences.en: The powder therefore collects at the displacement nodes, where the gas remains at rest.

sentences.cn: 目标是静止的状态.
sentences.en: That goal is a state of rest.

sentences.cn: 起初物体是静止的, 弹簧也未拉长.
sentences.en: The body is initially at rest, and the spring is initially unstretched.

sentences.cn: 帕金森病是一种中枢神经系统退变性疾病,其症状表现静止性震颤 、 身心反应迟钝 、 僵直和姿势不稳.
sentences.en: Parkinsons disease is a neurological disorder characterized by rest tremor, bradykinesia, rigidity and postural instability.

sentences.cn: 设物体的质量为2kg而且开始时处于静止状态.
sentences.en: Suppose the mass of the body is 2 kg and that it is initially at rest.

sentences.cn: 它从静止开始以匀加速度竖直下落.
sentences.en: It'starts from rest and falls vertically downward with uniform acceleration.

sentences.cn: 显然光子的一个主要区别于其它粒子的特征就在于它的静止质量为零.
sentences.en: Evidently one of the main distinguishing characteristics of photon is just its zest rest mass.

sentences.cn: 在这个理论中, 爱因斯坦抛弃了绝对时间和绝对静止的观念.
sentences.en: In the theory, Einstein discards the concepts of absolute time and absolute rest.

sentences.cn: 在与电子纵向运动静止的坐标系中, 把晶格场等效为虚光子.
sentences.en: In reference system of the electron at rest, the crystal field is taken as virtual photon.

sentences.cn: 在某时间间隔后它又重新恢复静止.
sentences.en: After a certain time interval it comes to rest again.

sentences.cn: 组成物体的粒子决不是静止的.
sentences.en: The particles of which bodies are made up are in no case at rest.

sentences.cn: 没有足够克服阻力的力, 静止的物体决不会运动.
sentences.en: Without force sufficient to overcome the resistance, bodies at rest will never move.

sentences.cn: 上方的水平点线,代表的是处于静止状态液体的自由表面.
sentences.en: The upper horizontal dotted line represents the free surface of the liquid at rest.

sentences.cn: 静止物体受力后才会运动.
sentences.en: A body at rest will never move until a force compels it.

sentences.cn: 若无外力的作用,静止的物体则不会移动.
sentences.en: A body at rest will not move till a force is exerted on it.

sentences.cn: 倘若使其继续静止, 流体就会慢慢集结起来.
sentences.en: If allowed to rest, the fluid builds up slowly.

sentences.cn: 物体会保持静止的状态直到有力的作用.
sentences.en: A body will continue in a state of rest until acted upon.

sentences.cn: 对于正在运动的时钟来说,时间似乎过得比静止的时钟慢一些.
sentences.en: Time appears to run more slowly for a moving clock than for a clock at rest.

sentences.cn: 在若干次不成功的重试之后, 该消息被移至最终静止队列.
sentences.en: After several unsuccessful retries, the message is moved to a final resting queue.

sentences.cn: 另外,你的参照系静止在一架起飞之后迅速加速的飞机上.
sentences.en: Or your reference frame is at rest in an aircraft that accelerates rapidly on takeoff.

sentences.cn: 在工程勘察中要求测试静止侧压力系数K0的日渐增多.
sentences.en: The test of lateral pressure coefficient K 0 at rest is required in prospecting.

sentences.cn: 你能说出一个用来表示静止的物体的惯性的物理量 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can you tell what quantity is characterizing the inertia of an object at rest?

sentences.cn: 世界上没有处于绝对静止状态的任何物体.
sentences.en: Eg : There is not any body in an absolute state of rest in the world.

sentences.cn: 一个静止的物体永远不会运动,除非有一个力强迫它.
sentences.en: A body at rest will never move unless a force compel it.

sentences.cn: 风车的帆叶现在静止不动了.
sentences.en: The sails of the windmill are now at rest.

sentences.cn: 如果房子对地球表面来说是静止的话, 那么地球本身是在无能运动的.
sentences.en: If houses are at rest relative to the earth's surface, the earth itself is not motionless.

sentences.cn: 当你翻开每一页书时,你在进行动量传递.你的动能有一部分引起书页加速,从静止到翻转.
sentences.en: Some of your kinetic energy has caused the page to accelerate from rest and to over.

sentences.cn: 静止时, 可通过仪表盘上的按钮使用机电制动装置.
sentences.en: At rest, an electromechanical park brake can be applied via a button on the dashboard.

sentences.cn: 我认为你应该暂时停止踢足球。
sentences.en: I think you ought to give football a rest for a time.

sentences.cn: 士兵们停止前进,休息一下.
sentences.en: The soldiers halted and rested from their march.

sentences.cn: 他停止扫地,倚着扫帚休息.
sentences.en: He stopped sweeping and rested on the broom.

sentences.cn: 一个组织一旦失去了创新精神,开始吃老本, 他的进步也就到此停止了.
sentences.en: Once an organization loses its spirits of pioneering rest on its early work, its progress stops.

sentences.cn: 筷子的往来差不多没有停止过.
sentences.en: The chopsticks of the diners seldom rested.

sentences.cn: 如今, 我意识到我的思想尚未停止.
sentences.en: Now, I recognise I have not set my mind to rest.

sentences.cn: 她再三停止运动, 但疼痛并未因此消失.于是她去看了医生, 而诊断结果是关节炎.
sentences.en: It didn't go away after repeated rests, so she visited a doctor, who diagnosed joint inflammation.

sentences.cn: 我们没有理由躺在过去的功劳上停止不前.
sentences.en: We have no cause to rest on our laurels.

sentences.cn: 一个小时后, 鲍勃停止划桨,开始休息.
sentences.en: After one hour, Bob stopped rowing to take a rest.

sentences.cn: 停止那样做!
sentences.en: Give it a rest!

sentences.cn: 请你停止这噪音, 我需要安静.
sentences.en: Please could you stop the noise, I'm trying to get some rest.

sentences.cn: 当音量稳定下来后,富有色彩的颤音时不时出现, 从未停止.
sentences.en: As soon as the volume steadies itself , the trill begins to descend chromatically, never resting.

sentences.cn: 看作舌头的火来到和停止在最早的使徒身上.
sentences.en: Seemed as if Tongues of fire came and rested on the early disciples.

sentences.cn: 他需要停止工作休息一下.
sentences.en: He needs a rest from work.

sentences.cn: 也许停止写作,安于现状会对他的声誉更好一点.
sentences.en: It might be better for his reputation if he stopped writing and rested on his laurels.

sentences.cn: 厂长需要停止工作休息一下.
sentences.en: The director needs a rest from work.

sentences.cn: 我想休息一下, 让我们停止拖地吧.
sentences.en: I want to have a rest, Let's stop sweeping floor.

sentences.cn: 在接下来的5年时间里,路易一直没有停止过研究.
sentences.en: Louis Braille never rested from that day until five years later.
sentences.from: 英汉非文学 - 科学史

sentences.cn: 军官命令部队停止行进,休息一下.
sentences.en: The officer halted his troops for a rest.

sentences.cn: 的确,谁进入了天主的安息, 衪也就停止自已的工作而安息,正如天主停止自已的工作而安息一样.
sentences.en: And whoever enters into God's rest, rests from his own works as God did from his.

sentences.cn: 停电致使冰箱停止工作.
sentences.en: The power failure brought the refrigerator to a rest.

sentences.cn: 他们直至死者入殓才停止.
sentences.en: They won't stop until the dead is rested in the coffin.

sentences.cn: 她停止写作业并且休息了一会,然后接着又继续写作业了.
sentences.en: To stop her homework and the rest for a moment and then went the homework.

sentences.cn: 他要他们休息一会儿, 但谁也不肯停止干活.
sentences.en: He urged them to take a rest. But none of them agreed to stop work.

sentences.cn: 他将会停止工作,享受一天剩下的时光.
sentences.en: He will kick off his responsibilities and enjoy the rest of the day.

sentences.cn: 为了关闭紧密,可以部分旋转. 在完全开启状态,阀瓣处于松弛性停止状态.
sentences.en: Can partially rotate for tight shutoff. In the fully open position , it rests against a stop.

sentences.cn: 想成为百万富翁的人不能停止工作.
sentences.en: The man who wants to become a millionaire can never rest on his oars.

sentences.cn: 在完全开启状态, 阀瓣处于松弛性停止状态.
sentences.en: In the fully open position , it rests against a stop.

sentences.cn: 我认为你应该暂时停止踢足球。
sentences.en: I think you ought to give football a rest for a time.

sentences.cn: 他非得找到她才会安心。
sentences.en: (figurative)He won't rest (= will never be satisfied) until he finds her.

sentences.cn: 他要了解真实情况之后才会安心.
sentences.en: He will not rest until he knows the truth.

sentences.cn: 不查明事实真相她不会安心.
sentences.en: She will not rest until she gets to the bottom of the matter.

sentences.cn: 白天给她带来激情, 夜晚能够使她安心休息.
sentences.en: As every day brought her stimulating emotion, so every night yielded her recreating rest.

sentences.cn: 从影以来, 他就没有安心的休息过.
sentences.en: Since entering the film business, he has never had a real rest.

sentences.cn: 安心修养, 振作精神.
sentences.en: Get lots of rest. Keep up your spirits.

sentences.cn: 以令人信服的品质,使用户更放心,安心.
sentences.en: Set user's heart at rest with reliable quality!

Sentence.sentence: This means they often have to make a special effort to lay the past to rest.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Clearly, there is no such thing as a perfect memory – their extraordinary minds are still using the same flawed tools that the rest of us rely on.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: When dogs looked at expressions of angry dogs, their eyes rested more on the mouth, perhaps to interpret the threatening expressions.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: To conduct the tests, the University of Helsinki researchers trained 31 dogs to rest in front of a video screen.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Pre-K advocates insist it is proven and will succeed if integrated with the rest of the child's schooling.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The wide majority of the rest were illegal, unforced entries that resulted from something like a window being left open.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Yet moments like this one are just the kind of intense absorption and pleasure adults spend the rest of their lives seeking.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They remain poor for the rest of their lives.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: If the most health-conscious among us have such deep swings in our shut-eye levels throughout the year, how much sleep are the rest of us losing? They are culture-related.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A child's ability to become deeply absorbed in something, and derive intense pleasure from that absorption, is something adults spend the rest of their lives trying to return to.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes a new technology doesn't drive the old one out, but only parts of it while forcing the rest to evolve.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The rest of the energy savings comes from the solar units.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He repeatedly took an existing but half-formed idea－the mouse-driven computer, the digital music player, the smartphone, the tablet computer（平板电脑）－and showed the rest of the industry how to do it properly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Dealing with crime takes up the rest of their time.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The divorce rate rose again during the rest of the decade as the recovery took hold
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But everyone needs some rest to stay alive.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The rest he got from sitting in a rocking chair
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The closest that Herpin came to resting was to sit in a rocking chair and read a half dozen newspapers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What's the program for the rest of that day?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: City officials cooperated with the 4-H members in planting trees, building cooking facilities, pick-me tables, swings and public rest rooms.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And then we spend the rest of the time, actually working on my own cars, the same problem
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Maybe you just need to rest it for a few days.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Almost every child, on the first day he sets foot in a school building, is smarter, more curious, less afraid of what he doesn't know, better at finding and figuring things out, more confident, resourceful (机敏的), persistent and independent than he will ever be again in his schooling – or, unless he is very unusual and very lucky, for the rest of his life.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Clearly, there is no such thing as a "perfect" memory – their extraordinary minds are still using the same flawed tools that the rest of us rely on.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: If the most health-conscious among us have such deep swings in our shut-eye levels throughout the year, how much sleep are the rest of us losing?
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: She also knew from previous work conducted on birds and dolphins that these animals put half of their brains to sleep at a time so that they can rest while remaining alert enough to avoid predators.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The rest goes into the soil.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月四级真题（第二套）听力

Sentence.sentence: Transitions between stages could be marked with sabbaticals as people find time to rest and recharge their health, re-invest in their relationships, or improve their skills.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Was the rest of India crowded?
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Yet cities in sub-Saharan Africa are not getting richer the way cities in the rest of the world have.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C
